column4: How can I see what exactly is need for the system to boot? I ask because I have my root partition on sda6, and sda1 to sda5 are unused. But sda1 is bootable and I wonder if it has some function. Does it contain the MBR?
fdisk -l just shows me they exist, but apparently they're not mounted anywhere or referenced from fstab.
if you are wondering the jump in partition numbering, it is due to using an extended partition
